IslandBatRestored.name: Field Office Mummified Bat Reward
IslandBatRestored.hint: Found by breaking non-ore rocks in the Volcano

IslandFrogRestored.name: Field Office Mummified Frog Reward
IslandFrogRestored.hint: Found by cutting weeds in Jungle

IslandCenterSkeletonRestored.name: Field Office Mammal Skeleton Reward
IslandCenterSkeletonRestored.hint:
Skull -- Found in Golden Coconuts
Spine -- Found by fishing in Island North
Leg (2) -- Found by breaking fossil stones (high chance)
Ribs -- Found by breaking fossil stones (low chance)
Tail -- Found by panning in Island North

IslandSnakeRestored.name: Field Office Snake Skeleton Reward
IslandSnakeRestored.hint:
Skull -- Found by digging artifact spots in Island North or West
    and fishing in Island West
Vertebra (2) -- Found by digging artifact spots in Island West
